item.title: 29 Leaks
item.description: From Distributed Denial of Secrets Millions of emails, phone calls and faxes from London-based company formation agent The London Office (then called: Formations House) and its related companies, used to facilitate fraud in Africa, Europe, Asia, the Middle East and the Americas. RELEASE #29 Leaks Millions of emails, phone calls and faxes and other documents from UK-based Formations House (“The London Office”) and related companies. DATASET DETAILS COUNTRY Multiple TYPE Various SOURCE FILE SIZE 400 GB DOWNLOADS (How to Download) MAGNET Link TORRENT Link DIRECT DOWNLOAD Link MORE REFERENCES OCCRP EDITOR NOTES Pronounced “Number 29 Leaks” Contents [1] [Background] [2] [Timeline] [3] [Findings] [4] [References] [5] [Research] Background Formations House, now The London Office, facilitates international money laundering by taking advantage of the lax regulatory framework of the United Kingdom and many of its former colonies.
